archimate:Principle.name: <<ELAP:ArchitecturePrinciple>> Digital First
archimate:Principle.documentation: http://data.europa.eu/2sa/elap/digital-first Public services are transformed into digital public services Rationale Making public services digital makes them more accessible, reduces administrative burdens and time and allows faster responses to individuals and organizations. The European Commission has also set out a strategy for the digital transformation of its own services. Digital channels are also the Commissionï¿½s preferred way to communicate. Principle Source C(2022) 4388 final COMMUNICATION TO THE COMMISSION European Commission digital strategy Next generation digital Commission
